rules.label: Chemistry I or Chemistry I with Advanced Lab
HASS 4000-level Course
rules.extra_text: 2 and 4-credit PD 2 courses cannot be used to satisfy both the HASS 4000 and PD 2 areas.

rules.label: Professional Development II
rules.extra_text: No more than 12 credits at the 1000 level can be applied to the HASS Core.

if_branch.label: Two courses in the same Subject Code; one of which is above 1000 level
Two courses in the same Subject Code; one of which is above 1000 level

rules.label: Intro to Engineering Analysis or Intro to ECSE
rules.extra_text: ECSE 1010 is required for EE and CSYS majors, otherwise take ENGR 1100.

rules.label: Engineering Graphics & CAD
rules.extra_text: ENGR 1400 recommended for all ENGR majors, take ENGR 1200 if interested in MECL major, take CIVL 1200 if interested in CIVL major.

rules.label: 1-Credit Engineering Introductory Course
rules.extra_text: ENGR 1300 Required for AERO, BMED, MECL majors; CHME 1010 Required for CHEG majors; CIVL 1100 Required for CIVL, ENVE majors. ISYE 1100 Required for ISYE majors; MANE 1060 Required for AERO majors; MANE 1100 Required for NUCL majors; MTLE 1200 Required for MATL majors.

rules.label: Intro to Engineering Design
rules.extra_text: Alternate option for MANE and ECSE majors- MANE 2220. ENGR 2050 or MANE 2220 should be taken in second year.

rules.label: Free Electives
rules.extra_text: No more than 6 ROTC credits may contribute toward fulfillment of degree requirements for engineering majors.
